archimate:Requirement.name: IR.2.5.11a: a) maintained in an information risk register (e.g. a spreadsheet, database or dedicated risk management tool) providing details about important risk factors, such as threat events, likelihood or frequency of a threat event occurring and potential business impact
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
